name: Weight of vehicle and driver
description: Total of driver and vehicle weight

name: Top speed
description: The faster the vehicle, the more risk it poses to public health. For manufactured vehicles, its top speed should be its maximum allowable speed as limited by the factory.

name: Footprint per max capacity
description: Area footprint occupied by the vehicle, per person, based on maximum passenger capacity. For instance, for a vehicle that occupies 10m² with a maximum capacity of 5 people, this value should be 2m².

name: CO2 per max capacity
description: Carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions generated per person when the vehicle is filled to its maximum capacity.
